summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LinkedIn Authority Engine Phase 2 features. All backend APIs are fully functional (24/24 endpoints passing) and frontend integration is working perfectly. All 4 new features successfully implemented and tested.
passed_tests: Backend Knowledge Vault file upload endpoint
Backend Knowledge Vault gem extraction with AI
Backend Post Publishing with engagement timer
Frontend Knowledge Vault page loads at /vault
Frontend Add Note dialog opens and creates items
Frontend Extract Gems button triggers AI processing
Frontend Editor Schedule button opens dialog
Frontend Schedule dialog with date picker, slot dropdown, time input
Frontend Navigation includes Vault and Analytics links
